definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: beauty;—abs. [[יׁ֫פִי]] Is 3:24 + 5 t. ; cstr. [[יְפִי]] Ez Eze 28:7; sf. [[יׇפְיְִ֑]] v:Eze 28:17; [[יׇפְיְֵ]] Ps 45:12 + 5 t.; [[יׇפְיוֹ]] Is 33:17 + 2 t.; [[יׇפְיׇהּ]] Pr 6:25, Es 1:11; beauty of a woman Is 3:24, Ps 45:12, Es 1:11, Pr 6:25, cf. Pr 31:30; of Jerus. under fig. of woman Ez Eze 16:14, Eze 16:15, Eze 16:25; Tyre Eze 27:3 ([[כְּלִי֫לַת יׁ֑פִי]]), cf. v:Eze 27:4, v:Eze 27:11; prince of Tyre, beauty of (his) wisdom Eze 28:7; king of Tyre v:Eze 28:12 ([[כְּלִיל יפי]]), v:Eze 28:17; ideal beauty of king of Judah Is 33:17, Zion ([[מִכְלַל־יׁ֑פִי]]) Ps 50:2, cf. La 2:15 ([[כְּלִי֫לַת יׁ֑פִי]]); of Egypt under fig. of tree Ez Eze 31:8; of ransomed people of ´[[י]] Zec 9:17.
